jobTitle: Director of Global Alliances - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you a relationship builder with a knack for driving growth?

We're seeking a dynamic Director of Global Alliances to join our team and expand our reach in the healthcare, distribution, and retail industries. This role is key to forging strategic partnerships and driving revenue growth.

What You'll Do

Build and nurture strong relationships with key partners in the healthcare supply chain.

Develop and execute joint go-to-market strategies to increase market adoption of our solutions.

Lead and manage partner programs and initiatives.

Enable partners with the tools and resources they need to succeed.

Analyze partner performance and identify opportunities for growth.

What You'll Need

At least 10 years of experience in partner development or alliances management in the software industry.

A proven track record of building and managing successful partnerships.

Strong business acumen and a deep understanding of the supply chain industry.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to travel up to 25% of the time.

Why Join Us

Opportunity to work with industry-leading partners and customers.

Competitive salary and benefits package.

Collaborative and supportive work environment.

Chance to make a significant impact on the company's growth.

Employment Type: Full-Time
